name: Mosque
description: Produces religious units and houses religious technologies. Starting in the Castle Age (III), religious units can pick up Relics and place them in this building to generate Gold.
descriptionCN: 生产宗教单位并可研究宗教科技。从城堡时代 (第三时代) 开始，宗教单位可拾取圣物并将其放置在此建筑中以产生黄金。
influences:
Buildings within influence gain +5 Fire Armor.
Structures built within House of Wisdom influence area help progress to the Golden Age and unlock additional bonuses.
influencesCN:
影响范围内的建筑火焰护甲 +5。
在智慧宫影响范围内建造的建筑可以帮助加快进入黄金时代的进度，并解锁额外的加成。
